heading: HB08859
0: AN ACT REQUIRING GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS IN CHARGE OF PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION TO RIDE PUBLIC TRANSPORT AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-01-23
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08859
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS IN CHARGE OF PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION TO RIDE PUBLIC TRANSPORT AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH
ABSTRACT : Aims to address Metro Manila's lack of efficient mass transit system serving millions of Filipinos living and working in the area. Proposes to stir up empathy among concerned government officials to have first-hand experience riding public transportation to determine how to resolve the issue.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2019-01-21
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2019-01-23
